The Anker laptop Stand is a popular and affordable option, and it's great that you're considering its weight capacity.

According to Anker's official website and product descriptions, the Anker laptop Stand has a weight capacity of up to 8.8 pounds (4 kg). This means it's designed to support laptops with a weight range of around 3-8 pounds, which covers most modern laptops.

Since you purchased your laptop from Best Buy, I'd like to know more about your laptop's specifications. Could you please tell me the exact model of your laptop? I can look up its weight and dimensions to give you a better idea of whether the Anker laptop Stand can support it.

In general, most 15-inch laptops weigh between 4-6 pounds, so the Anker laptop Stand should be able to handle it. However, if your laptop is heavier or has a unique design, it's always better to double-check.

Additionally, you can also consider the following factors to ensure the stand can hold your laptop securely:

* The laptop stand's base is wide and stable, which helps prevent it from tipping over.
* The stand's arms are adjustable, allowing you to customize the fit to your laptop's size and shape.
* The stand's material is sturdy and durable, which adds to its overall weight capacity.

If you're still unsure, you can also check out reviews from other customers who have purchased the Anker laptop Stand and used it with laptops similar to yours. This can give you a better idea of its real-world performance and weight capacity.

Let me know if you have any other questions or concerns!
